title: Was the current economy the real reason Carmike Cinemas decided not to build the new complex at Monkey Junction? ( I find it hard to believe that a shopping center restriction prohibited construction at this site when tenants gave their OK.  I was looking forward to viewing a movie in the big screen format here and now I am really disappointed that it will not happen.  Does Carmike have plans to add the Big D digital format at its existing complex on Cinema Drive since Monkey Junction will not be built?)
